activities: We process personal information relating to our customers, suppliers, employees, and applicants located in the European Union or Switzerland. We process customer and supplier information to provide products and services to our customers, facilitate our business operations and supplier relationships, and in connection with meeting our legal and regulatory compliance obligations. We process employee and applicant information to fulfill employment-related functions and comply with our legal, business and contractual obligations. Our Safe Harbor Employee and Applicant Notice is available on our Intranet and applicant website. Privacy Notice Effective: 07/18/2014
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer, supplier, employee and applicant data (off-line, on-line, manual process, etc.).
recoursemech: We have designated the American Arbitration Association (AAA) as our independent recourse mechanism.
